summary: A 9-ball pool practice game with APA scoring system. Fixing ball unlocking when 9-ball is unclicked and React error on session abandon.
architectural_notes: Auto-dead ball revert: When 9-ball is unclicked, balls auto-marked as dead in current inning should revert to unscored/clickable state
Session abandon cleanup: Use setTimeout with 0 delay between clearPracticeSession() and navigate() to prevent React error #185 during unmounting

existing_features.title: Fix the auto-dead ball revert logic in ApaRackScoringPanel: when the 9-ball is unclicked, all balls that were auto-marked as dead in the current inning (balls 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 in the screenshot) must revert to unscored/clickable state instead of remaining locked

Fix React error #185 in PracticeGamePage when clicking 'End Session Without Saving': add a microtask delay (setTimeout with 0ms) between clearPracticeSession() and navigate('/') to prevent state updates on unmounted components

projectName: Fix 9-ball unlock behavior and session abandon error
